Message.Title: rightwing extremists gun down police
Message.Msg: Suspects in deputy killings linked to extremists NEW ORLEANS (AP) â€” At least some of the seven people arrested in a fatal shootout with Louisiana deputies have been linked to violent anarchists on the FBI's domestic terrorism watch lists, a sheriff said Saturday. Detectives had been monitoring the group before Thursday's shootout in Laplace in which two deputies were killed and two more wounded, said DeSoto Parish Sheriff Rodney Arbuckle. His detectives and other law enforcement discovered the suspects were heavily armed adherents to an ideology known as the "sovereign citizens" movement. The FBI has classified "sovereign citizens" as people who believe they are free from all duties of a U.S. citizen, like paying taxes. The FBI considers the group's members a danger for making threats to judges and law enforcement, using fake currency and

Topic.Title: Obama Is Going Down! Day, By Day, By Day!

Message.Msg: Obama is going down with the 20 somethings. I have a friend whose daughter just graduated from college and she related that many of her co-eds are not finding work in their related fields. They blame Obama. Like most kids their age they were not politically motivated prior to this election. They've gotten a reality check and are now eager to use that vote even if only in protest. Obama is not convincing the next generation that he can meet the challange of putting things right. So far, he's just offered coulda, woulda, shoulda, blaming the other side. That only goes so far and people start to look at what has changed.....worse was not the deal. *** Obama is losing the young vote. He's lost older Americans too. His approval among those over 40 is 35%. Few people are enthusiatic about voting for him again. It's time for a regime change. Obama has done nothing for the last 2 years. Navy SEALS did the heroic work and he took the credit. Uncle Ben has had the pedal to the metal for 4 years but Obama's got chains wrapped around his axle.

Message.Title: Ryan was pro stimulus
Message.Msg: "WASHINGTON - When Congressman Paul Ryan has been asked the past few years about the value of stimulus to the sagging economy and the nation's jobless, the Wisconsin Republican has dismissed it as meaningless, and dubbed it "sugar-high economics." But that's when President Obama is pushing for the spending. When it was President George W. Bush arguing for more stimulus to boost a slow economy in the early 2000s, Ryan's economic analysis was entirely different. "What we're trying to accomplish today with the passage of this third stimulus package is to create jobs and help the unemployed," Ryan said, in comments unearthed by MSNBC's "Up with Chris Hayes" and provided to HuffPost. "What we're trying to accomplish is to pass the kinds of legislation that when they've passed in the past have grown the economy and gotten people back to work." Video of the comments will be aired at 8:00 a.m. Sunday on MSNBC. "In recessions unemployment lags on well after a recovery has taken place," Ryan accurately noted in 2002.

Message.Title: The Great Myth of "Obama Inherited The Mess!"
Message.Msg: Just another Great Lie of the Democrat Party and their Press-Media whores! Compared to Reagan in 1981, Obama inherited less unemployment, far less inflation and dramatically lower interest rates! And today, nearly FOUR years later, Obama has done Jack to fix it... save for wasting Trillions on "Crony Phony Capitalism", fruitless Green Garbage, corrupt Union Bosses, useless Bail-Outs, a Stupid Nation Building War in Afghanistan, and beyond all that, begging the FED to plow in more and more Trillions! Trillions & Trillions of Taxpayer dollars have now been swept down the Obama sewer and today, we are at $16,000,000,000,000 (TRILLION!!) in DEBT... the greatest explosion of DEBT in World History!! Moreover... as to the "Financial Crisis", it was Democrats (Obama prominently among them!!) who were clearly at the CENTER of the Mortgage Debacle... for over a Decade, pumping, humping and legislating garbage underwriting of Mortgages by Banks, ubiquitous bundling of Mortgage Backed Securities and crazy use of Credit Default Swaps, all deliberately intended to put Tens of Millions of homes into the hands of Tens of Millions of Dead-Beats! Indeed, the GOP Congress tried to stop the Fannie Freddie "Suicide on America" in the 2004-05... and the Democrats threatened a filibuster and killed it!! And it worked... at least until the Housing Market exploded a couple years later... at nuclear levels! "Inherited A Mess"... not even close!! But the Democrat Press & Media love to spew this lie 24/7/365! The "Bush Recession" was moderate, at worst, and it ended in June of 2009... and when it comes to "The Financial Mess", the Democrat Party was at its very core!!! The truth is that it is the NEXT President who will "Inherit A Real Mess"... God help us, in January 2013!!
